H3.text: who did vasco de gama explore for. Portugal

A4.text: Vasco da Gama was a Portuguese mariner, explorer and nobleman.

A5.text: As reward for his accomplishments, da Gama was appointed Governor of India in 1524, with the title of Viceroy, and was ennobled the Count of Vidigueira in 1519.
